title: Entity-Instance Same Object
details:
## Entity-Instance State Pattern

In VisibilityHandler, the tabWindow and entity are the SAME OBJECT:
- `const tabWindow = this.quickTabsMap.get(id);`
- `tabWindow` IS the entity stored in quickTabsMap
- No need for separate `const entity = this.quickTabsMap.get(id);`

When updating entity state, directly use tabWindow:
```javascript
// GOOD - use tabWindow directly
tabWindow.minimized = true;

// BAD - redundant Map lookup
const entity = this.quickTabsMap.get(id);
entity.minimized = true;
```

This is important because:
1. Reduces duplicate Map lookups
2. Makes it clearer that tabWindow IS the entity
3. Simplifies code and removes confusion about "entity vs instance"
